#summary Listing of all controller request functions.
#labels chapter,0.8

_*Note:* This wiki contains "bleeding edge" documentation, which may reflect a future version of Wheels. Entries in the wiki may also be incomplete and unedited. For the "official" documentation, please visit [http://www.cfwheels.com/docs Official ColdFusion on Wheels Documentation]._

These functions are called from actions in your controller files.

==Example==

`controllers/Blog.cfc`:

{{{
<cffunction name="sendToWheels">
  <cfset redirectTo(url="http://www.cfwheels.com")>
</cffunction>
}}}

==Functions==

 * [flash flash()]
 * [flashClear flashClear()]
 * [flashCount flashCount()]
 * [flashDelete flashDelete()]
 * [flashInsert flashInsert()]
 * [flashIsEmpty flashIsEmpty()]
 * [flashKeyExists flashKeyExists()]
 * [isAjax isAjax()]
 * [isGet isGet()]
 * [isPost isPost()]
 * [redirectTo redirectTo()]
 * [renderNothing renderNothing()]
 * [renderPage renderPage()]
 * [renderPageToString renderPageToString()]
 * [renderPartial renderPartial()]
 * [renderText renderText()]
 * [sendEmail sendEmail()]
 * [sendFile sendFile()]
